dataList.content: <Ne yapacağız? Eğer kavga etmeye devam edersek hiçbir yere varamayız…>
Şaşırtıcı bir şekilde, Ishmael güldü.
Düşünecek ne var ki? Gizli kozumuz elimizin altında.
<We have what now?>
Just the right person to teach them something “legit”.
After you give it a good @#$@#$ and @$#% it up, go $#%@#$ on it.
Next up, you @%$#$^ the @$%@$% and then soak it in #$#@.
Lastly…
Bir insanın kelime dağarcığının miğde bulandırıcı derecede korkunç bir şeyi bu kadar ayrıntılı olarak anlatabilecek kadar geniş olabileceğini bilmezdim.
The thugs’ eyes were uncharacteristically twinkling—some were even taking notes.

dataList.title: Tieqiu Crew
dataList.content: I’ll be damned, she had me struck.

dataList.title: Tieqiu Crew
dataList.content: Hoowee, that snap couldn’t be bolder… You’re what they call the wizardess o’ the tongue, eh, lady?
No. That has to be the gob of a witch, yeah.
Even Heathcliff, the man who must have had a rougher life than most in the Backstreets, shuddered by the end.
I cannot help but applaud the creativity. Indeed, the pen… Nay, the tongue is mightier than the sword.
I thought I was pretty familiar with the sailor’s mouth, being a seafarer for half my life…
But this made me realize my vocabulary was only the tip of the iceberg.

dataList.title: LCCB
dataList.content: I honestly couldn’t fathom why the higher-ups would organize a team of people like you.
I don’t suppose the lineup was meant to be understood by the likes of us.

dataList.title: LCCB
dataList.content: And I’m still having trouble figuring out the meaning of this personnel measure…

dataList.title: LCCB
dataList.content: Ama, sanırsam… bu o kadar da kötü değilmiş.
Saude, you’ve finally reached the stage of acceptance. Congratulations.
